Returns true if all Types... are the same type, returns false otherwise.

{{macros.function_stats( [], "true if all Types... are the same type, false otherwise.", "This function never throws exceptions", "Constant." )}} {{macros.example_code( " import cmoon.meta; int main() { using tl = cmoon::meta::type_list; using tl2 = cmoon::meta::type_list; static_assert(!tl::is_all_same_type()); static_assert(tl2::is_all_same_type()); } " )}} {% endblock %}
